synopsis.text: Cherry blossoms bloom amidst a backdrop of clandestine operations and supernatural intrigue in this side story of Darker than Black. A Contractor's untimely death sparks a race to uncover the secrets buried beneath a cherry tree, drawing in Hei and his team, alongside the tenacious Misaki Kirihara and her police force. Meanwhile, whispers of a stolen chemical ripple through the Contractor underground, leading to a dangerous game of cat and mouse when clues from a young author's work hint at the substance's whereabouts. Amidst the chaos, one figure stands out â€“ the enigmatic and lethal BK201, the Black Reaper, whose true motives remain shrouded in mystery as he rewrites the rules of this deadly game.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
